title: Koppenberg Chaos Grinds Tour of Flanders to a Standstill: ‘It Felt Like We Were Doing Cyclocross’
content:
'Suddenly everyone stopped': Van der Poel and Jorgenson made it clear, but logjam of bodies and bikes blocks peloton on Flanders' most notorious wall.

Read the full article at Koppenberg Chaos Grinds Tour of Flanders to a Standstill: ‘It Felt Like We Were Doing Cyclocross’ on Velo.
author: ahood
